meanings.definition: Ornamental work of fine wire formed into delicate tracery
meanings.sent1: The filigreeing on the jewelry was so intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She admired the filigreeing on the antique vase.
meanings.sent3: The filigreeing on the cake was so fancy, it looked like lace!
meanings.sent4: The filigreeing of stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The filigreeing on the gate made it look like a fairy tale entrance.

meanings.sent1: She enjoyed filigreeing her notebooks with colorful designs.
meanings.sent2: The artist spent hours filigreeing the borders of the painting.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't resist filigreeing his sneakers with doodles.
meanings.sent4: Her words filigreeing the air with elegance and grace.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filigreeing through the leaves created a beautiful pattern on the ground.

meanings.definition: The act of creating delicate designs with fine wire
meanings.sent1: Her filigreeing of the metal was precise and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The workshop showcased the art of filigreeing with demonstrations.
meanings.sent3: The filigreeing competition brought out the creativity in everyone.
meanings.sent4: His filigreeing of words in the letter expressed his emotions perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The filigreeing of the wire into a heart shape was a symbol of love and craftsmanship.
